function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"No definitive treatment or preventive vaccine for the coronavirus","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread transmission and severe illness","Mitigation":"Promote adherence to public health guidelines, invest in vaccine research and development","Technologies":"Vaccine research, public health education","People":"General public, healthcare workers, immunocompromised individuals","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Treatment of COVID-19 is mostly symptomatic","Impact":"Limited effectiveness in treating the disease, potential for increased severity of symptoms","Mitigation":"Invest in research for effective treatments, support infrastructure for patient care","Technologies":"Medical research, healthcare infrastructure","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, hospital administrators","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Patients with mild COVID-19 symptoms managed at home","Impact":"Possibility of undetected spread of the virus, strain on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Enhance testing and surveillance, provide remote healthcare support","Technologies":"Testing kits, telemedicine","People":"Patients, household members, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare providers"}]}
